mapper.insert: insert into role (id, name, is_employ, create_time, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEmploy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into role
id,
name,

create_time,
updated_time,
